attributes.action: Make carrying a knife a minimum 5 year sentence
attributes.additional_details: Too many lives are being lost on our streets in the uk, and in my local area of derby is becoming more frequent, a knife is a deadly weapon and carrying one has only one intention in mind! The punishment needs to be a lot more severe than the current system that clearly don’t work! A review of the system in knife crime needed immediately as the current one is flawed, we also need a monthly knife amnesty across the country in all areas. Too many people dying too young because of peoples actions
attributes.background: Review the current system regarding knife crime in the uk, make it a minimum of 5 years in prison if caught carrying a knife. Needs to be reviewed immediately.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about knife crime, but we're not sure if you just want a minimum 5-year sentence to be imposed for possession of a knife, or if you want a wider review or additional changes.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Zero Tolerance on Knife Crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581806

Minimum 10-year sentence for knife possession and 20 years for use of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580709

Make it mandatory for local councils in England to have a weapons amnesty bin: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577621
